node.title: In the suburbs of Melbourne, Logan felt a void in his life. He filled it with fire
node.alt: A man in traditional dress stands in darkness illuminated by large flames on either end of a long club.
node.description: Leaving the beaches of Samoa for the suburbs of Melbourne created a void in Logan’s life, one that could only be filled by returning to his roots.
node.content:
["As the light fades over Werribee beach, a teenager sets a fire.\u00a0", "He lights both ends of a\u00a0long, hooked knife,\u00a0then\u00a0looks out\u00a0over the ocean,\u00a0his\u00a0face illuminated by the dancing flames.\u00a0And then he begins to spin.\u00a0", "He is performing the Siva Afi \u2014 the\u00a0fire\u00a0knife\u00a0dance \u2014 once performed by Samoan warriors to recreate their tales of war upon their return to the village.\u00a0", "With deft hands\u00a0he swiftly twirls, throws, catches\u00a0the flaming\u00a0Nifo\u00a0Oti, his ceremonial knife.\u00a0", "As he does so\u00a0he feels his ancestors around him, and\u00a0channels them in this ancient dance.\u00a0", "Victoria's Werribee beach is a long way from the shores of Samoa\u00a0\u2013\u00a0Logan Tapula's ancestral homeland \u2013 and for a time, that distance seemed insurmountable.", "When Australian-born Logan was two years old\u00a0his mum took him to Samoa for a family reunion.", "It was only ever meant to be a short visit, but they stayed for nine years.", "", "
From ages two until 11, Logan lived in Samoa with his extended family.(Supplied.)
", "", "
Logan's childhood was playing with his cousins at the beach.(Supplied)
", "", "
Logan and his mum travelled to Samoa for a family reunion, but didn't leave for nine years.(Supplied.)
", "Logan's childhood was spent with his cousins on the beach, playing Samoan games like \"gang gang gang ga mo\" and \"ish\", eating Samoan food and speaking the language.", "When he was 11 years old\u00a0Logan and his mum moved back to Melbourne for school.", "The move was supposed to enrich Logan's life, but instead it had the opposite effect.", "", "
Spending his teenage years in Melbourne,\u00a0Logan felt distanced from his culture.(Supplied.)
", "\u201cI began losing my Samoan language, eating junk food and playing\u00a0PlayStation\u00a0all the time,\u201d\u00a0the now-18-year-old\u00a0says.\u00a0", "\u201cI started getting frustrated with everything \u2014 the disrespect the other students showed the teachers because in Samoa we always respected our elders, not having the freedom to walk next door and play with my neighbours because I didn\u2019t know them, or they didn\u2019t have kids.\u00a0", "\u201cI\u00a0was frustrated because I\u00a0felt something was missing and I didn\u2019t know what.\u201d\u00a0", "But\u00a0Logan\u2019s mum had an idea.\u00a0", "She enrolled him in a Samoan school where Logan could\u00a0regain\u00a0the language and\u00a0would once again be\u00a0exposed to\u00a0his\u00a0culture.\u00a0\u00a0", "She also signed him up for a traditional slap dance class, but Logan says, \"it just wasn't for me\".", "\"I just didn\u2019t feel a connection to it,\u201d he says.\u00a0", "Not enjoying the class made the distance he felt from\u00a0his\u00a0culture seem even\u00a0greater.\u00a0", "Determined to cure Logan's ennui\u00a0his mum tried again, signing him up for a Siva Afi workshop.", "\u201cMemories of Samoa flooded my mind,\u201d Logan says.\u00a0", "\u201cI remembered learning as a 10-year-old as my uncle showed me how to hold a stick and spin.\u00a0", "Logan was hooked.\u00a0", "\u201cThat workshop changed everything for me,\u201d he says.\u00a0", "His family was thrilled that the Siva Afi had\u00a0spoken to Logan.\u00a0", "", "
The director of the school where Logan learned Siva Afi says the committment required to master Siva Afi is key to its cultural significance.(Supplied.)
", "His grandmother travelled to Samoa and bought Logan his first\u00a0Nifo\u00a0Oti to practise with.\u00a0", "He spent every day out in the backyard throwing, catching and\u00a0spinning.", "But\u00a0he\u00a0was frustrated that\u00a0in-person\u00a0workshops were\u00a0often not available, so resorted to watching YouTube videos to improve his technique.\u00a0", "As his skills grew, so did his confidence.\u00a0", "The\u00a0Nifo\u00a0Oti his grandmother had gifted him were too special to set alight, so he saved up his pocket money and with his mum\u2019s blessing, bought\u00a0himself\u00a0a set\u00a0that he could use with fire.\u00a0", "
A dexterous display of determination\u00a0
", "The Siva Afi wasn't always performed with fire.", "It began more than a thousand years ago as a ceremonial demonstration of a warrior's strength.", "The Nifo Oti, first carved out of wood and stone, then with a metal blade as technologies progressed, was the classic weapon used by Samoans heading to war.", "", "
The blade of the Nifo Oti is hooked.(ABC News: Marc Eiden)
", "", "
The midsection of Logan's Nifo Oti is intricately decorated.(ABC News: Marc Eiden)
", "The hooked blade was deadly\u00a0to adversaries and to any warrior who might miscalculate a throw.", "In the 1940s, famed Samoan performer Freddie Letuli, seeking an even more dramatic show, added fire to the ends of his Nifo Oti ahead of a knife dance performance in the US.", "Fred Schwenke, director of Matavai Cultural Art Centre, says nowadays the Siva Afi is performed globally for entertainment and in competitions.", "But, he says, it's the process of learning the dance that is most important.", "\"Siva Afi is a very important part of the culture, because of the time and energy it takes to learn,\" Mr Schwenke says.", "\"It's like a lifelong lesson, where you overcome all those things like the time spent practising, sometimes hurting yourself. It takes a lot of patience,\u00a0effort and discipline to progress to using it with fire and using a real Nifo Oti.\"", "It was a workshop run by Mr Schwenke's daughter\u00a0Moemoana\u00a0that inspired a young Logan in the first place.", "
Sharing the craft
", "Passing on knowledge of Samoa is a common calling in Logan's family.", "His uncle\u00a0worked as an instructor in Samoa, teaching cultural practices such as cooking, dance and garment-making.", "His mum ran a business in Melbourne teaching classes in Samoan language.", "Logan and his mum both felt his journey of reconnection to their Samoan culture had given him valuable insight.", "", "
Logan now runs online workshops to teach others the art of Siva Afi.(ABC News: Marc Eiden)
", "With the help of his mum, Logan launched his own Siva Afi workshops.", "\"She thought it would be a good idea if I taught Siva Afi to help people who had lost their connection to the same culture and help people who had been through what I had,\" Logan says.", "\"I was on board with it straight away because it means a lot to help other people.\"", "He now shares his craft with people around the world.", "\"I want this knowledge to be available to all Samoans and anyone wanting to build their confidence, discipline, and feel a connection to Samoan culture,\" he says.", "\"This connection helped fill the gap that was frustrating me. I no longer wonder who I am and hope to make the journey easier for others to find who they are and what they stand for.\"", "
Credits
", "Words and production: Jacqueline Howard", "Photo and video: Marc Eiden", "The\u00a0ABC\u2019s Takeover Melbourne program gives a voice to young people across Greater Melbourne. If you would like to find more stories\u00a0or learn about the next Takeover Melbourne intake\u00a0go to\u00a0the Takeover website.", "", "
